entry.title: Current Conditions: -10.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Daniel's Harbour 06:30 AM NST Saturday 04 March 2023
Temperature: -10.2°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.4 kPa rising
Humidity: 66 %
Wind Chill: -17
Dewpoint: -15.3°C
Wind: NW 17 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 8.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness late this afternoon. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 8. Wind chill minus 23 this morning and minus 16 this afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:34 AM NST Saturday 04 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 11 with temperature rising to minus 6 by morning.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of snow beginning late this evening. Amount 2 cm. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 11 with temperature rising to minus 6 by morning. Wind chill minus 21 this evening and minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 05:34 AM NST Saturday 04 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Periods of snow or rain. High plus 1 except minus 3 south of Plum Point.
entry.summary: Periods of snow changing to rain near noon. Risk of freezing rain late in the morning. Snow south of Plum Point in the afternoon. Snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Rainfall amount 10 mm. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light in the morning. Wind becoming northeast 30 gusting to 50 in the afternoon. High plus 1 except minus 3 south of Plum Point. Wind chill minus 14 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:34 AM NST Saturday 04 March 2023
